## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

Sending crypto in GCrypto allows you to transfer digital currencies from your GCrypto wallet to another wallet or exchange.

### **How to send crypto using GCrypto:**

1. Tap on your desired crypto
2. Tap **Send**
3. Input the amount you want to send, the recipient’s wallet or exchange address, and the destination tag (if applicable) **Note**: You can also scan the **QR code** of the recipient’s address

![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/41424496469529)

     4\. Review the details of your transaction and acknowledge the prompt noting that the transaction is irreversible then tap **Send**

     5\. Enter the One-Time Pin sent by PDAX via Email, then tap **Submit Code**

To confirm the status of your sent crypto, visit the **GCrypto Transactions** page in your dashboard.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [How can I send crypto over PHP 50,000 to another wallet or exchange in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31308558631321-Send-Crypto-Over-PHP-50-000)
- [How can I receive crypto using GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/10203149752601-Receive-Crypto-with-GCrypto)
- [I can’t send or receive crypto in GCrypto. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31309702924441-Cannot-send-or-receive-crypto-with-GCrypto)
- [What are the GCrypto Networks and Fees I need to know about?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/22747167650201-GCrypto-Networks-and-Convenience-Fees)
